title: CyberTip Triage — 90-Second Investigator Demo
description: End-to-end walkthrough of AI-powered NCMEC CyberTip triage: priority scoring, Wilson compliance, warrant workflow, and bundle deduplication for ICAC task forces.
target_audience: ICAC investigators and supervisors evaluating triage automation tools

cues.narration: Your task force received twelve hundred NCMEC tips last quarter. Most were triaged by hand. CyberTip Triage changes that.
cues.caption: The tip volume problem

cues.narration: The dashboard gives you a real-time picture. Stats cards show total tips, open cases, and average time-to-triage at a glance.
cues.caption: Live operational overview

cues.narration: Every incoming tip is scored by AI and assigned a priority tier — from P1 Critical down to Standard — so your team works the right cases first.
Let's filter to critical tips only. These involve active victim crisis indicators flagged automatically during ingestion.
cues.caption: Filter: P1 Critical

cues.narration: Selecting the first tip opens the detail pane with the full NCMEC report, subject information, and legal analysis.
Notice this file is blocked. The ESP did not view the attached images, so under the Wilson ruling, the Fourth Amendment prohibits law enforcement from opening them without a warrant.
cues.caption: Wilson compliance — automatic file blocking

cues.narration: The system handles this automatically. No investigator can accidentally view a protected file. Your suppression risk drops to zero.
To unlock the file, click Apply for Warrant. The system pre-populates the affidavit template with tip details and routes it for judicial review.
cues.caption: One-click warrant workflow

cues.narration: Once the warrant is granted, blocked files are automatically unblocked and the chain of custody is logged for prosecution.
Each tip also includes circuit-specific legal guidance. The system knows whether you're in the Sixth Circuit or the Ninth and adjusts its analysis accordingly.
Here's the cluster alert. Forty-seven tips traced back to one viral incident. The system bundles them so your team works one case, not forty-seven.
cues.caption: Bundle deduplication

cues.narration: Scroll down the queue and every row tells the same story — prioritized, compliant, and ready for investigation without manual sorting.
CyberTip Triage. Fewer missed victims, zero suppression risk, and your investigators focused where it matters. Request a task force pilot today.
cues.caption: CyberTip Triage — Built for ICAC
